column4: i installed vsftpd on my box but i cant upload to it.. i keep getting 550
i installed vsftpd on my box but i cant upload to it.. i keep getting 550
have you forwarded all the ports necissary?
yes ports are forwarded
which ones have you forwarded?
but somewhere in the config i think i need to edit it so that ftp login users have 777 permission?
you also need about a thousand other ports for passive mode
to upload i need more ports forwarded?
i believe thats what passive mode is for
so which ports should i forward to be able to upload?
i beleive the standard passive ports are 1024 - 65535.. but thats a few too many so i forwarded 60000 - 65535
you sure i need to forward that many? and if i do i wont get 550 anymore?
i'm nat terribly familiar with vsftpd... one moment
i was having the same error, i believe
ok i hate forwarding more then the minimal amount of ports
i know, me too
yes - but each part (separated by " ; ") on a new line
http://www.flix.co.il/showVideo.asp?m=1003360 check that out
woops, not that link :) https://www.redhat.com/docs/manuals/enterprise/RHEL-3-Manual/ref-guide/s1-ftp-vsftpd-conf.html that one
i have write-enabled = yes uncommented :S
did that work, though?
forgot 2 restart service sec
